participant_1.background:
My family accepts me as I am, even with my red hair and my history of working for Monsanto.
My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative everyday.
My family works in various fields, but we all have a passion for life.
I live in California, where I am pursuing my dream of becoming a fashion designer.
I like to make clothes in my favorite color, blue.

participant_2.background:
Others will be impressed by my video editing skills.
I went camping with my family at a lake and we all had a great time swimming, hiking and roasting marshmallows over the campfire.
my friends and i go hiking all the time.
my husband is the ceo of taco bell.
My recipe box is a collection of memories from my family.

content.text: Hi there! I am just doing some video editing. How are you doing?
I'm doing pretty well, thanks for asking! I am in California, pursuing my dream of becoming a fashion designer.
Oh wow, that is awesome! I have always been interested in fashion, but I never quite had the courage to pursue it as a career.
You should definitely give it a try! It is so much fun to be able to create something from nothing and see it come to life.
I might have to take your advice! I am really good at video editing, so maybe I could combine that with fashion and do something like fashion videos?
That would be really cool! You could do videos about fashion trends, how to put together an outfit, or even just behind the scenes footage of fashion shows.
That is such a great idea! I am definitely going to look into that. Thanks for the inspiration!
You're welcome! I am glad I could help. What is your favorite thing about fashion?
My favorite thing about fashion is that it is always changing and evolving. There is always something new to discover and learn about.
I agree! That is one of the things that I love about it too. It is always keeping me on my toes.
Me too! I think it is so important to stay up-to-date on the latest trends, so that you can always look your best.
I could not agree more! It is so important to feel confident and comfortable in your own skin, and fashion can definitely help with that.
Definitely! Fashion is a great way to express yourself and show the world who you are.
